About Us

Expert care delivered with accuracy, artistry, and extensive experience.

Celebrating 26 years of excellence, Dr. Arup Chattopadhyay Dental Clinic is renowned as the best dental clinic in Bally, Kolkata. Originally founded in 1998 . Today, we are a team of the best dentists in Kolkata, known for their technical expertise and dedication.

Our Clinic

We prioritise hygiene and comfort, ensuring a relaxing experience for every patient.

Our Team

We have a team of smart, skilled, and compassionate professionals dedicated to your dental care.

Our Special package

Get a comprehensive dental package which includes exams, cleaning, RVG X-rays, oral cancer screening, and whitening.
  • Avoid ultra-processed foods
  • Dont eat heavily meats
  • Minimize your sugar intake
  • Avoid bright lights before sleep
  • Drink only safe water
  • Avoid harmful use of alcohol

Our Treatments

Holistic expert care for all your dental needs

Expert care for all your dental needs, including general dentistry, cosmetic treatments, root canals, periodontal treatments, prosthetics, orthodontics, extractions, and implants.
